data.name: Secret Garden
data.detailed_description:
Secret Garden — is a traditional jigsaw puzzle that anyone can easily play.

If it is a digital jigsaw puzzle, there is no need for a wide space to assemble, a wooden frame to decorate the finished puzzle, and a worry about losing the last one piece.
You can finish the jigsaw puzzle illustration on the monitor and view the completed illustrations at any time.

A lot of convenient functions for completing the puzzle

Secret Garden — is a definitive version that you can enjoy a jigsaw puzzle of Windows and Linux platform

data.supported_languages: English, Italian, Greek, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 500 series
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard, mouse/trackpad
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel core i9
  • Memory: 120 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 3090
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard, mouse/trackpad

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.04
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 500 series
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard, mouse/trackpad
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Intel core i9
  • Memory: 120 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 3090
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard, mouse/trackpad

package_groups.name: subscriptions
package_groups.title: Buy Secret Garden Subscription Plan
package_groups.description: To be billed on a recurring basis.

subs.option_description: 79₴ at checkout, auto-renewed every 1 month(s) at 21₴.

content_descriptors.notes:
-Nudity or sexual content
-Not suitable for watching at work
-Not suitable for all ages
-All characters in the game are over 18 years old
